name: Maryam Elfakir
description: I met Maryam through the Society of Hispanic Professional Engineers (SHPE) mentorship program and have kept in touch since.

name: Jaime Breitkreutz
description: I met Jaime during my time as President of the Data Science and Informatics club, where Jaime serves as the technology coordinator.

name: Ethan Ahmed
description: I met Ethan during the 2025 OSC MiniHack where he and his team won second place overall.

name: Luana Kunzler Maldaner
description: I met Luana 19 years ago when my parents decided they wanted another child, and we have stayed close.
